title: Why Tasmania
creator_credit: Phillip Mark-Law, Don Anderson, Tasmania. Directorate of Industrial Development and Trade and Tasmanian State Film Unit
brief_description: About the advantages that accrue from establishing new industries in Tasmania. Photographers: Chris Morgan, Russell Galloway ; script: John Edwards ; editors: Geoff Tyson, Peter Davis ; sound: Peter McKinley, Frank McIvor. Cast includes Leonard Teale.
